apple.title: HaloBuzz - Live Streaming & Social
apple.subtitle: Connect, Stream, and Play with Friends
apple.description:
HaloBuzz is the ultimate social platform for live streaming, gaming, and connecting with friends. Stream your favorite games, watch amazing content, play multiplayer games, and build your community.

Features:
• Live streaming with HD quality
• Interactive gaming with friends
• Virtual gifting and coins system
• Real-time chat and messaging
• Discover trending content
• Build your fanbase
• Safe and moderated environment

Perfect for gamers, content creators, and social media enthusiasts. Join the HaloBuzz community today!

permissions.storage: Required for caching and offline content
